subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Canada scored three goals in 2 minutes 27 seconds in the first period Friday on the way to a 4-2 victory against Russia and its third consecutive gold medal at the World Junior Ice Hockey Championship.
snippet: Canada scored three goals in 2 minutes 27 seconds in the first period Friday on the way to a 4-2 victory against Russia and its third consecutive gold medal at the World Junior Ice Hockey Championship.
